text: @piersmorgan Should have closed borders straight away, even to returning UK citizens abroad. . Tow illegal immigrants back to France. Stop all Chinese visitors. Track all mobile phones by mast. Trace all contacts put in quarantine eg a coronavirus hotel. A lot of the skiers brought it in.
